attributes.action: make liam docherty the supreem ruler of this land and of ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i liam docherty am petitioning to be the supreem ruler of these great lands and of ireland i will bring back the great in great britain and will make it the best nation once again

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
